channel.title: Dat physics...
channel.description:
Hello everyone, I made a video where I was playing with the physics of this game, I suppose that in newer versions things like this will be fixed, but sincerely, don't do it!! :smiley:
[url='https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=8g_QBBKF1t0']https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=8g_QBBKF1t0[/url]
Hope you enjoy, and thanks for this wonderful mod!

item.title: Dat physics...
item.dc:creator: fgsfds
item.description:
Well, technically, the NPC’s head is a box for the physics engine. That’s just how Source physics work. You can also stand on it.

Read full topic
